metadata.title: CVE-2019-20923 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which throw unhandled Javascriptexceptions containing types intended to be scoped to the Javascriptengine's internals. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.0 versions priorto 4.0.7.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
